content.thinking: Let me analyze the document following the classification workflow: 1. TEXT EXTRACTION The document appears to be a certificate titled "COMPOSICION ACCIONARIA" (Shareholding Composition). It contains: - Header with name "ASTRID ROCIO LOZANO" who appears to be a public accountant (Contador Público) - Document title: "COMPOSICION ACCIONARIA" - Statement from the public accountant of "CONSTRUCTORA E INMOBILIARIA RIVERA INCORA SAS" - Company NIT: 901.106.859-4 - Certification declaring the capital structure of the company - Table showing shareholder information with columns for names, ID numbers, percentages, values, and number of shares - Two shareholders listed with their ownership percentages (49% and 51%) - Total capital of 200,000,000 pesos - Date of issuance: March 16, 2021 in Bogotá - Signature of the public accountant 2. PRIORITY CHECKS - Not BLANK: Document contains meaningful content - Not LINK_ONLY: No primary hyperlinks redirecting elsewhere 3. ISSUER IDENTIFICATION - The document is issued by a public accountant (Astrid Rocio Lozano) - It's a certification about a corporate entity (CONSTRUCTORA E INMOBILIARIA RIVERA INCORA SAS) - Not issued by DIAN or Chamber of Commerce 4. DOCUMENT FUNCTION ANALYSIS - The document's function is to certify the ownership structure of the company - It specifically details the shareholder composition with percentages - It shows capital contributions and number of shares - It identifies the owners by name and ID numbers 5. CATEGORY CLASSIFICATION This appears to be an "ACC" document (Shareholding Composition Certificate): - Title explicitly says "COMPOSICION ACCIONARIA" - Contains a list of shareholders with ownership percentages - Shows capital contributions and number of shares - Certified by a public accountant - Follows the corporate structure certification format Must-have indicators for ACC category that this document has: - Shareholder terminology: "COMPOSICION ACCIONARIA", "socios accionistas" - Ownership data: percentages (49%, 51%), capital values ($98,000,000, $102,000,000) - Number of shares (196, 204) - Owner identification with names and ID numbers - Relationship types: "socios accionistas" - Certification by authorized representative (public accountant) 6. CONFIDENCE VALIDATION - Strong evidence: The document clearly states its purpose as certifying shareholder composition - The structure and content match the ACC category definition - Clear title "COMPOSICION ACCIONARIA" and content focused exclusively on ownership structure - No conflicting indicators suggesting another category Based on this analysis, the document should be classified as "ACC" (Shareholding Composition Certificate).
